PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-08862021-08-11,  ,  ,  TBS,  , 
ActPublic Sector Pension Investment Board Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Public Sector Pension Investment Board Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the PUBLIC SECTOR PENSION INVESTMENT BOARD REGULATIONS in order to create a new exception to the 10% limit for U.S. Treasury Securities, thereby allowing the PSPIB to hold more than 10 per cent of its assets in securities issued or fully guaranteed by the Government of the United States of America, and change the basis on which compliance with the 10 per cent limit is measured from book value to market value
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0207 Publication Date: 2021-09-01
AttachmentsAttachment
